mapper.select: select * from (select * from ITEMLIST where itemfilename not like '%gif%' order by ITEMLIST_NO desc) where rownum <= 8
select * from (select * from ITEMLIST where itemfilename not like '%gif%' order by ITEMLIST_NO desc) where rownum <= #{endRow} and rownum >= #{startRow} order by ITEMLIST_NO desc

select * from (select ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.* FROM (select * from ITEMLIST where itemfilename not like '%gif%' and ITEMNAME like '%'||#{search}||'%' order by ITEMLIST_NO desc) A WHERE ROWNUM < #{endRow}) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} order by ITEMLIST_NO desc

select * from (select ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.* FROM (select * from ITEMLIST where itemfilename not like '%gif%' and ITEMNAME like '%'||#{search}||'%' order by ITEMLIST_NO desc) A WHERE ROWNUM < #{endRow}) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} order by ITEMSELLCOUNT desc
select count(*) from ITEMLIST where itemfilename not like '%gif%'
select count(*) from ITEMLIST where itemfilename not like '%gif%' and ITEMNAME like '%' ||#{search}|| '%'
select * from ITEMLIST where ITEMLIST_NO = #{itemno} and itemfilename not like '%gif%'
select * from (select * from ITEMLIST where itemfilename not like '%gif%' order by ITEMSELLCOUNT desc) where rownum <= 4
select i.ITEMLIST_NO from ITEMLIST i , MY_ITEM m where i.ITEMLIST_NO=m.ITEMLIST_NO and m.MYITEM_NO=#{useritempk}

select count(it.ITEMNAME) from my_item mi,item_log il,itemlist it,using_item ui where mi.ITEMLIST_NO = it.ITEMLIST_NO and mi.MYITEM_NO = ui.MYITEM_NO and ui.USING_ITEM_NO = il.USING_ITEM_NO and mi.MEMBER_ID = #{member_id}

select * from ( select rownum rnum,it.ITEMNAME,mi.BUY_DATE,ui.START_DATE,ui.END_DATE,il.FINAL_STATUS from my_item mi,item_log il,itemlist it,using_item ui where mi.ITEMLIST_NO = it.ITEMLIST_NO and mi.MYITEM_NO = ui.MYITEM_NO and ui.USING_ITEM_NO = il.USING_ITEM_NO and mi.MEMBER_ID = #{member_id}) where rnum >= #{startRow} and rnum <= #{endRow}
